title: Cyclists Rescue Kittens at Gravel Race: ‘We Were Legitimately Herding Cats’
content:
One rider named Earl Anema helped move seven kittens off of the FoCo Fondo race course. In the process, he ended up adopting one.

Read the full article at Cyclists Rescue Kittens at Gravel Race: ‘We Were Legitimately Herding Cats’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
